"Guiden": "You've been quite helpful to everyone, it seems."
"I think you're ready to learn about all of the Classes."
"If you become skilled with all of the various classes, you'll be able to go toe-to-toe with even the stronger DOLLS."
"Central City is home to instructors for all of the Classes. I've told them about your abilities."
"They're in the southeastern part of Central City. Go see what they have to teach you about each Class."
